text: National Route 14 is a national highway in South Korea connects Geoje to Pohang. It established on 31 August 1971.대통령령 제5771호 일반국도노선지정령, 1971년 8월 31일 제정. ==Main stopovers== ; South Gyeongsang Province * Geoje - Tongyeong - Goseong County - Changwon - Gimhae ; Busan * Gangseo District (Jukdong-dong) ; South Gyeongsang Province * Gimhae (Buwon-dong ・Samjeong-dong) ; Busan * Gangseo District (Sikman-dong) ; South Gyeongsang Province * Gimhae (Bulam- dong) ; Busan * Gangseo District - Buk District - Dongnae District - Geumjeong District - Haeundae District - Gijang County ; Ulsan * Ulju County - Nam District - Ulju County - Nam District - Jung District - Ulju County ; North Gyeongsang Province * Gyeongju - Pohang ==Major Intersections== * (■): Motorway IS: Intersection, IC: Interchange === South Gyeongsang Province === {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%; text-align: center;" |- !
